name: Little Plague Doctor
description:
Little Plague Doctor is a project from 2021 to learn the basics of Pixel Game Maker MV and get back into pixel art.

While working on it I had more ideas for content:
- other abilities or even other plague doctors with their own abilities
- gadgets
- other types of enemy viruses
- other modes
- a backstory
etc.

For the moment I want to concentrate on getting better at pixel art and building prototypes in PGM, but I'd love to do more with Little Plague Doctor eventually, too. Therefor I'm uploading this demo - which has about as much as I originally intended for the project and then some ;) - to see if people are interested in it.

So, please let me know what you think  :)
